title: BlockBeat
author: BlockBeat
content: We're proud to formally announce what's been in the works, what were about, and when were launching!BlockBeat is revolutionizing the way investors and traders stay informed about the rapidly evolving world of blockchain and cryptocurrency, with our innovative technology and unparalleled resources.The BlockBeat Terminal, provides a state-of-the-art workstation that delivers real-time news from thousands of primary sources, sentiment analytics, A.I. enriched data, and more, all in one comprehensive platform.Our cutting-edge technology combined with the expertise of our team enables us to provide investors, traders, and other market participants with the necessary insights to make informed decisions in the fast-paced digital asset space.RoadMaphttps://ibb.co/K2XWMKdGoogle Chrome Web Store Pluginhttps://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/blockbeat-price-peek/cgkdbhlfmjiglkhcdjjmfbajmddenihiWebsite & Early Access Infohttps://www.blockbeat.ioDiscordhttps://discord.gg/blockbeat/

comments.author: Bittothefuture
comments.body: Hmm, it seems the join waitlist button is not working?

comments.body: It seems to be working fine. You can also just scroll to the bottom of the page and enter your e-mail. m
